title: Answering hard questions we’ve been avoiding...
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Manny and Laura play some pop culture trivia again! They also answer some juicy questions that they've been avoiding... What's their least favorite beauty product? Who do they have beef with? What weird sex kink are they willing to try and what's off limits? Stay tuned to find out!
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733

More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.
Thanks to our sponsors: 

You can listen to the The Making of a Swindler mini-series on You Can’t Make This Up starting February 9th. Follow on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or wherever you get your podcasts.

I love how my smile feels and looks and I know you’ll love Lumineux as much as I do, too! Get 15% off your order today by going getlumineux.com/fool and use code fool.

With Flex, you can do it all. Go to flexfits.com/fool and use code fool for 20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits—or 10% off your first Flex Cup—PLUS free U.S. shipping!

Go to dailyharvest.com/fool to get up to forty dollars off your first box!

Upgrade your top drawer! Go to yourparade.com/FOOL and use code FOOL to get 20% off your first order.


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
